text: This Full Spectrum Oil by @COTC_Gardens is modeled after the original #RickSimpsonOil, a 1:1 CBD:THC #cannabis concentrate.  Like #RSO, it may help: #cancer, #wasting, severe nausea, aches and pains, #depression, #anxiety, #PTSD, #seizures, Crohn's, ulcerative #colitis, and more. https://t.co/cZ1DjW6hC4
